com.revature.pokemonv2.dao

Class TrainerDAOImp

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revature.pokemonv2.dao.TrainerDAOImp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TrainerDAO

    public class TrainerDAOImp
extends java.lang.Object
implements TrainerDAO
    The TrainerDAOImp class contains methods that deal with the selection, insertion, and updating of trainers.
